medium.suggestion: Corrija os problemas manualmente seguindo as dicas

fixability.manual_steps:
Corrija por categoria (do mais critico ao menos):

1. mnd (10 issue(s)):
   Defina constantes para numeros magicos: const StatusOK = 200; const PermissionUserRW = 0644

2. prealloc (4 issue(s)):
   Pre-aloque slice com capacidade estimada: make([]Type, 0, expectedSize)

tools.fix_command: # NAO use --fix automaticamente, revise cada issue

executable_steps.expected_output: Arquivo JSON com todos os issues
warnings: Review manual necessario para cada fix

examples: 1. internal\seeds\manager.go:26 - fieldalignment: struct with 32 pointer bytes could be 24 (govet)
4. internal\seeds\manager.go:252 - non-wrapping format verb for fmt.Errorf. Use `%w` to format errors (errorlint)
5. pkg\bootstrap\bootstrap.go:13 - fieldalignment: struct with 16 pointer bytes could be 8 (govet)
6. pkg\contracts\route.go:21 - fieldalignment: struct with 40 pointer bytes could be 32 (govet)
7. pkg\orchestrator\types.go:15 - fieldalignment: struct with 88 pointer bytes could be 80 (govet)
8. pkg\orchestrator\types.go:24 - fieldalignment: struct with 120 pointer bytes could be 104 (govet)
9. pkg\orchestrator\types.go:34 - fieldalignment: struct with 144 pointer bytes could be 120 (govet)
10. pkg\orchestrator\types.go:46 - fieldalignment: struct with 64 pointer bytes could be 56 (govet)

type SyncRequest struct {
	SDKVersion string    `json:"sdk_version"`
	Module     string    `json:"module"`
	Seeds      []string  `json:"seeds"`
	Timestamp  time.Time `json:"timestamp"`
	Requester  string    `json:"requester"`
}
